resources.string: The Computer Science POSt requires specific grades in the courses listed below. Please provide your numerical grades.

The Computer Science POSt requires: 

 1. A CGPA of at least 2.5 after taking: 
 CSC/MAT A67 
 CSC A48 
 MAT A22 
 MAT A31 
 MAT A37
2. A grade of at least B in CSC A48

3. A grade of at least C- in two of: 
 CSC/MAT A67 
 MAT A22 
 MAT A37
